actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A resolution relating to the minimum denomination of savings certificates which bear interest at a rate indexed to Government securities interest rates.

summary.text: Small Savers Equity Resolution of 1979 - Requests the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, and the Federal Home Loan Bank Board to permit the issuance of certificates of deposit in minimum denominations of $1,000 or less bearing interest at a rate determined by reference to the interest rate payable on one or more classes of obligations of the United States.

titles.title: A resolution relating to the minimum denomination of savings certificates which bear interest at a rate indexed to Government securities interest rates.
